title: Good job Riot
body:
I do enjoy IRL riot videos. watching frequencies at the moment, thank you riot, the more i watch your videos the more i wish i could work at riot headquaters

YOU DID GOOD
Well done riot

Just listened to the new album, OMG Riot make me so pleased so much effort they put into this game am glad to be a part of the LoL community (excluding toxics)

replies.body:
Glad you liked it! Did you have a favorite part? 

I think mine was seeing the early concept of Amumu...
"Amumu lives forever as a weepy child wrapped in what appears to be toilet paper"
...haha!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotTerra,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZoQxsHEy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-29T00:34:17.478+0000)
>
> Glad you liked it! Did you have a favorite part? 
> 
> I think mine was seeing the early concept of Amumu...
> "Amumu lives forever as a weepy child wrapped in what appears to be toilet paper"
> ...haha!

Favourite part, well all the music and design you guys put into it to make it amazing. but probs favourite part is every time he said cluster %%%%, like and its so out of the blue that it makes it funny. if i hadthat skill level in music creation i'd be absolutely trying to match it or go better (not possible but i would try, its easier then bronze heh)
IRL AS OPPOSED TO ANOTHER UNIVERSE OR?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RemAhHqmUyM

this song is better. Anivia op
